title: Netflix Clone
summary: Created a cloned version of Netflix. Implemented user authentication with firebase and populated the data needed with FireStore. Has sign in/up feature and browse page.

title: Poké Store
summary: Poké Store, a checkout app that allows you to find the pokemon that is ready to add to favorites, add to cart, and order.

title: H&L Auto Body
summary: Developed website for independently owned auto body shop from concept to deployment. Responsive, mobile-first approach which increased traffic by 20%.
